author: Brandjuh
description: Scrapes alliance member data from MissionChief USA with historical tracking. Monitors player credits, ranks, and online status across all pages with automated hourly updates.
install_msg:
✅ Members Scraper installed!

Use `[p]load membersscraper` to enable.

Commands (owner only):
• `[p]scrape_members` - Manual scrape

Automatic scraping runs every hour at :00

Database: scraper_databases/members.db
Fields: member_id, username, rank, earned_credits, online_status, timestamp
short: Alliance members scraper with historical credit tracking
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores scraped MissionChief member data in a local SQLite database. No personal data is collected beyond what's publicly visible on MissionChief.
